thread.title: Obama tours glacier to highlight march of climate change
thread.title_full: Obama tours glacier to highlight march of climate change | News24

author: news24.com
title: Obama tours glacier to highlight march of climate change
text:
Kenai Fjords National Park - US President Barack Obama viewed Alaska's monumental Exit Glacier Tuesday, in a bid to drive home the impact climate change is already having on America.
Obama travelled to southern Alaska's Kenai Fjords National Park, where he stood against the backdrop of the vast, but receding glacier, where posts mark the ice's retreat since 1815.
"This is as good of a signpost of what we're dealing with when it comes to climate change as just about anything," Obama said.
He pointed to a changing climate that has brought less snow and longer, hotter summers and an icy retreat has been anything but glacial.
